TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 顯示用於 控制項，類似於按鈕的使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a button-like user interface (UI) for use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示按鈕類似的 UI。The class is a specialized type of used to display a button-like UI. 資料行類型特製化來保存此類型的儲存格。is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式後將現有的資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行作為 [模式] 儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 若要回應使用者按下按鈕後，處理或事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件處理常式中，您可以使用屬性來判斷是否發生按一下按鈕資料行。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred a the button column. 您可以使用屬性來判斷按一下是否發生在特定按鈕儲存格。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a particular button cell. 資料行的資料格相關屬性會包裝函式樣板的儲存格的名稱類似的屬性。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本的儲存格的屬性值會影響只儲存格以範本為基礎，在變更後會加入。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的資料格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新範本的儲存格和資料行中的所有資料格，如有必要，請重新整理資料行顯示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 當啟用視覺化樣式時，按鈕資料行中的按鈕來塗繪，使用，和儲存格樣式，例如透過屬性指定會有任何作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在特定的資料列上執行動作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 使用個人時，您可以使用類似的程式碼物件。You can use similar code when working with individual objects. 在此範例中，事件處理常式會先判斷是否按一下按鈕儲存格上，然後擷取商務物件相關聯的資料列。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:存取 Windows Form DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉式清單中的物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，每當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的屬性複製到新的儲存格，並請務必也將複製的任何已新增至衍生類別的屬性值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 若要取得或設定 屬性，您必須加入隨 .NET Framework 安裝之 Accessibility 組件的參考。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

summary.span: 取得儲存格的裝載編輯控制項型別。

The of the underlying editing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此覆寫的屬性一律會傳回`null`因為沒有相關聯 Windows 裝載控制項; 按鈕類似使用者介面會轉譯。This overridden property always returns `null` because there is no associated Windows hosted control; the button-like user interface is rendered.

summary.span: 取得或設定可決定按鈕外觀的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style determining the button's appearance.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

span.span: The value of the or the value of the owning column if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法適合擷取共用的資料列，而無法儲存在本機儲存格的值仍然保持共用中的資料格的文字。This method is useful to retrieve the text of a cell in a shared row, which cannot store cell values locally and remain shared. 您必須傳入的實際資料列索引，因為共用的資料列的索引，-1。You must pass in the actual row index because shared rows have indexes of -1. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

related.span: 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

returns.span: 如果使用者在不按其他修飾鍵的情況下按下空格鍵；否則為 。

span.span: if the user pressed the SPACE key without modifier keys; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法之前呼叫方法。The method is called just before the method. 它必須傳回`true`如果在呼叫具有相同引數的效果的資料列若要停止共用`rowIndex`。It must return `true` if the call to with the same argument has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`. 它應該傳回`false`否則。It should return `false` otherwise. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

related.span: 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法

span.span: Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出主控資料行的文字是否會出現在儲存格所顯示的按鈕上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the owning column's text will appear on the button displayed by the cell.

value.span: 如果值屬性會自動比對的值主控資料行的屬性，否則。

span.span: if the value of the property will automatically match the value of the property of the owning column; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鈕的資料格會顯示為按鈕的文字。The of a button cell is displayed as text on the button. 屬性可讓您設定每個資料格，則按鈕文字，或使用所有按鈕的儲存格的父資料行的屬性值。The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value of the parent column for all of the button cells. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]
